mapper.insert: insert into product (type, title, body, regdate, photo, oldprice, price, size) values (#{type}, #{title}, #{body}, #{regdate}, #{photo}, #{oldprice}, #{price}, #{size})
mapper.update: update product set title= #{title}, body = #{body} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, photo, regdate, viewcnt, price, titlesub, oldprice from product where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from product where bno > 0
mapper.update: update product set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
